SELECT CASE
WHEN timestampdiff( SECOND, now( ), max( end_time ) ) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE timestampdiff( SECOND, now( ), max( end_time ) ) END as expireSecond, max( end_time ) as endTime FROM user_energy_expire_time WHERE uid = #{uid} AND deleted = 0
SELECT DISTINCT uid FROM user_energy_expire_time WHERE deleted = 0 AND DATE_FORMAT( end_time, '%y%m%d' ) >= DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( CURDATE( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ), '%y%m%d' )
